oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Harvey. Martha Cofer Harvey & child.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Martha Cofer Harvey & child. Tintype. On October 16, 1865 she married Thomas Smith Harvey, a Union Army veteran.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portraits; Babies; Tintypes;
